ValidationRule.description: Only Customer Service, Sales Operations can modify the Address when record type is 'Customer or Partner'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(BillingAddress), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Customer', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner' ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Sales Operations', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Permission.Billing_Address ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sorry - Only Sales Operations and Customer Services can modify the Primary Business Address. Please open an internal ticket if you need to update this address.
